Headline: #47 47th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 47th/Calumet
ShortDescription: Westbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, King Drive, 43rd, Michigan and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Calumet.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, King Drive, 43rd, Michigan, 47th and over regular route due to street blockage near 47th/Calumet.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays due signal problems at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays due signal problems at Howard.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.
